theEdgeheg:ChaosEnergyPower.NAME: Chaos Energy
DESCRIPTIONS: Use the power from the Chaos Emeralds to fuel your cards.

theEdgeheg:MasterEmeraldPower.NAME: Master Emerald
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 Chaos Energy every time you play a Chaos card.

theEdgeheg:BulletStormPower.NAME: Bullet Storm
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b Guns after playing a GUNS card until you play a non-GUN.

theEdgeheg:GunFuPower.NAME: Gun Fu
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b Guns after playing a KATANA card. NL Gain #b Dexterity after playing a GUNS card. NL Both go away at the start of your turn.

theEdgeheg:LoseGunsPower.NAME: Lose Guns
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of turn, lose

theEdgeheg:PerfectAimPower.NAME: Critical Hits
DESCRIPTIONS: 5% of dealing double damage per Dexterity stack.

theEdgeheg:TeleportBehindPower.NAME: *teleports behind u*
DESCRIPTIONS: Play your next card #b more time(s)

theEdgeheg:EndlessKatanasPower.NAME: Endless Katanas
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces Katana cards played with another of the same type

theEdgeheg:ArtOfTheBladePower.NAME: art of the BLADE
DESCRIPTIONS: the first #b katana attacks are played twice

theEdgeheg:CrazyGirlfriend.NAME: Krazi Grrrfrend
theEdgeheg:CrazyGirlfriend.DESCRIPTION: when use gerlfrend cards cream does a random attack of #b.
